text: The Reunified Fourth International is a Trotskyist international organization that emerged from efforts to consolidate various factions of the Fourth International, originally founded by Leon Trotsky in 1938. The Fourth International was established to continue the revolutionary Marxist tradition, opposing both capitalist exploitation and the bureaucratic distortions of socialism under Stalinism.
